name: World of Wonder
description:
An open world VR game full of discovery and danger set in a beautifully vast landscape. Navigate the mysterious ruins, mountains, valleys and caves while harnessing your abilities to traverse and explore. Choose to play peacefully or upgrade your weapons by harvesting resources and build a base to call your home.

-Support for a wide variety of systems with various graphics options. Includes Nvidia DLSS support with customizable settings.
-Open world VR with a full day / night cycle
-Wildlife and enemies roam the environment but the player can choose to engage with them or not
-Free placement building system, crafted from resources collected in the world.
-Various movement options like a hover board, grapple hook and jetpack.
-Swim, fly, jump and climb a massive 100 square kilometer landscape full of places to explore.

WARNING: This game is made for use on a SSD. Use of this game on a normal hard disk may result in player discomfort.
